title: Set up scheduled job to check for pending todos every 30 minutes (if idle)
description: Create a launchd job that prompts BMO to check for pending todos every 30 minutes, but only if not already working on something. This keeps BMO productive during idle periods.

actions.note: Implemented: todo-reminder.sh checks if idle (no pending telegram, session exists), counts open todos, injects reminder. Launchd job runs every 30 min.
